bucket.description: Name of the bucket this intelligent tiering configuration is associated with.

filter.description: Bucket filter. The configuration only includes objects that meet the filter's criteria (documented below).

name.description: Unique name used to identify the S3 Intelligent-Tiering configuration for the bucket.

status.description: Specifies the status of the configuration. Valid values: `Enabled`, `Disabled`.

tierings.description: S3 Intelligent-Tiering storage class tiers of the configuration (documented below).
